text: Laura Dern is holding court. As the Big Little Lies star, 50, stepped out of the Beverly Hills Hotel on December 20, NBA star Baron Davis was doting on her. An eyewitness tells Us Weekly that following a lunch date where the pair were “ talking, laughing and having a great time, ” the athlete, 38, carried the actress ’ purse as the duo packed on PDA.
